scikits.statsmodels.family.links.cauchy¶

scikits.statsmodels.family.links.cauchy¶

The Cauchy (standard Cauchy CDF) transform

Notes

cauchy is an alias of CDFLink. cauch = CFGLink(dbn=scipy.stats.cauchy)
